faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about our offers

Question1.title: How does the initial diagnosis take place?
Question1.content: The initial diagnosis takes place over 2 weeks and includes: an in-depth document analysis, interviews with management and key team members, observation of current processes, and an evaluation of existing tools and systems.

Question2.title: What is the difference between SYSTEMA and the Sales Machine?
Question2.content: The initial diagnosis takes place over 2 weeks and includes: an in-depth document analysis, interviews with management and key team members, observation of current processes, and an evaluation of existing tools and systems.

Question3.title: How are the training sessions for our teams organized?
Question3.content: The initial diagnosis takes place over 2 weeks and includes: an in-depth document analysis, interviews with management and key team members, observation of current processes, and an evaluation of existing tools and systems.

Question4.title: What are the payment terms?

hero.title: SBBS Certification & Rating
hero.subtitle: Our certification system assesses and highlights your company’s level of organizational maturity. Join the elite network of SBBS-certified companies and stand out in your market.

evaluationSystem.title: A Comprehensive Evaluation System
evaluationSystem.subtitle: The SBBS rating is more than just a score: it is a management and valuation tool for your business.

certificationSBBS.title: Why Obtain SBBS Certification?
certificationSBBS.subtitle: The SBBS certification is an objective reflection of your company’s organizational maturity. It evaluates your performance across six key dimensions and positions you on a scale recognized by the African entrepreneurial ecosystem.
fearturesListes: Increased credibility with partners and investors
Objective benchmarking with companies in your sector
Badge and certificate to display on your communication materials
Exclusive access to the Omega Business community

levelsOfCertification.title: The 6 Certification Levels
levelsOfCertification.subtitle: Each level represents a stage of organizational maturity

levels2.title: SBBS-2 Precarious
levels2.description: Significant risks, fragile structure to be consolidated

levels3.title: SBBS-3 Functional
levels3.description: Organizational fragility, foundations to be strengthened

levels6.title: SBBS-6 Elite
levels6.description: Strong and autonomous company, recognized excellence

A.indicators: Organizational chart, documented processes, role distribution

C.indicators: Sales pipeline, conversion rate, customer satisfaction

ratingSimulator.subtitle: Each level represents a stage of organizational maturity

hero.title: Our Story, Our Mission
hero.shortText: Builders of Entrepreneurial Excellence in Africa
hero.subtitle: Since our creation, we have been supporting African SMEs and startups in their transformation toward operational excellence. Our unique approach combines local expertise with international standards to create sustainable and high-performing businesses.

card1.description: To structure and transform African SMEs into high-performing, profitable, and autonomous businesses. We build tomorrow’s economic champions by providing the tools, methods, and guidance necessary for sustainable growth.

card2.description: To become the leading partner for business transformation in Africa. We aim to build a structured, innovative, and competitive African entrepreneurial ecosystem on the international stage.

card3.description: Excellence, Impact, and Proximity. We combine methodological rigor with a deep understanding of African realities to deliver tangible and measurable results to every business we support.

careerPath.title: Our Journey
careerPath.subtiltle: The key milestones that shaped SBBS Consulting

card1.description: Creation of the SBBS Group with a clear vision: to support African businesses. First corporate consulting projects launched in Côte d'Ivoire.

card2.description: Opening of offices in Benin and Togo. Deployment of the SYSTEMA methodology, adapted to the African business context.

teams.title: Our Expert Team
teams.subtilte: Passionate consultants dedicated to your business growth

card1.description: A visionary of African entrepreneurship. With over 20 years of experience, he has developed innovative and practical business transformation strategies.

omegaBusiness.title: Join the SBBS Community
omegaBusiness.subtitle: Be part of a network of ambitious entrepreneurs transforming Africa’s economy

card1.description: There are many variations of passages of Lorem Ipsum available, but most have undergone some form of alteration, such as injected humor or random words that don’t look even slightly believable. If you are going to use a passage of Lorem Ipsum, make sure there isn’t anything embarrassing hidden in the middle of the text. All the Lorem Ipsum generators on the Internet tend to repeat predefined chunks as necessary, making this the first true generator on the Internet. It uses a dictionary of over 200 Latin words combined with a handful of model sentence structures to generate reasonable-looking Lorem Ipsum. The generated Lorem Ipsum is therefore always free from repetitions, injected humor, or non-characteristic words.
